titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the The black unicorn [videorecording] : Dudley Randall & the Broadside Press / written, produced and directed by Melba Joyce Boyd.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: The black unicorn [videorecording] : Dudley Randall & the Broadside Press / written, produced and directed by Melba Joyce Boyd.

odd.head: Creation/Production Credits
odd.p: Field director, Terry Kelley ; interviewers, Melba Joyce Boyd, Ron Scott ; research, Melba Joyce Boyd, Judith Schoenberg ; music, Kenn Cox.

archdesc.scopecontent: Provides a history of the Broadside Press and a biography of its founder, Dudley Randall. Includes interviews with Mr. Randall and other authors involved with the press over a twenty-five year period.
